Waltham.Gann Academy: Founded in 1997, Gann Academy is a coeducational Jewish high school located in Waltham, Massachusetts. The mission of Gann Academy is "to educate, to inspire, and to empower intellectually confident, passionately engaged, ethically responsible Jews who, through critical thinking and the contribution of their unique voices, will create a vibrant Jewish future and build a better world where human dignity will flourish." The school is a member of the National Association of Independent Schools. It was accredited by the New England Association of Schools and Colleges in the spring of 2004.
